titleStmt.title: A letter from the Lord Lieutenant of Ireland, to the Honorable William Lenthall Esq; Speaker of the Parliament of England, relating the good successes God hath lately given to the Parliament forces there. Die Lunæ, 25 Februarii, 1649. Ordered by the Parliament, that this letter be forthwith printed and published. Hen: Scobell, Cleric. Parliamenti.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1649-1650 : Cromwell)
Cromwell, Oliver, 1599-1658.
England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edward Husband and John Field, printers to the Parliament of England,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
